recommended_degree: Teknik Informatika, Sistem Informasi, Teknik Komputer (Sarjana)
job_description:
Basic experience in frontend & backend development
Familiar with JavaScript/TypeScript (React/Next.js) and Node.js or PHP
Understanding of RESTful APIs and basic API integration
Knowledge of databases: MySQL, PostgreSQL, or Firebase
Ability to work with Git for version control
Basic debugging, testing, and documentation skills
Strong willingness to learn and adapt to fullstack workflows
Good communication and teamwork skills
